app.title: Talk to your insurance agent
app.notRecordingMessage:
Ask anything about your Groupama insurance (MRH/home, liability, claims, assistance) or request an action (policies, claims, agency, contact).

Examples:
• I’m Jérôme Parel — my group reimbursement looks incomplete. What should I do?
• What does MRH home insurance cover (water damage, theft, glass breakage, vandalism)?
• I had a water leak: what are the first steps and what proof should I keep?
• What are the deadlines to declare theft or vandalism?
• Can you pull up my policies and my claims status?
• How do I contact 24/7 assistance or my nearest agency?
app.footer: Built with Azure AI Search + GPT Realtime in Microsoft Foundry

groundingFiles.title: Insurance information
groundingFiles.description: Sources used to answer your question.
